response.overview: Step back in time to the golden age of television with Honey, I’m Home!, a brand-new 1950s-style sitcom short film that’s all smiles, charm, and just a dash of chaos!  In this delightful episode, our picture-perfect couple sets out for a quiet dinner together, but their plans are served well-done when a relentlessly chatty waiter keeps popping up like a bad jingle! Can they enjoy their meal in peace, or will their night out become a comedy of interruptions?
response.tagline: Dinner for Two… and Then Some!
response.title: Honey, I'm Home!
